name: showdown-app
description: MLB Showdown Simulator - Mobile recreation of the classic baseball card game
author: Cam Riera

scripts.dev: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node scripts/ensure-local-env.js && node scripts/dev-local-orchestrate.js
scripts.db:test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {Pool} = require('pg'); const pool = new Pool({connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL}); pool.query('SELECT NOW()').then(r => console.log('✅ Database connected:', r.rows[0])).catch(e => console.error('❌ Database error:', e.message)).finally(() => pool.end());"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd mobile && npm install && cd .. && npm run verify
